I thought I heard voices from somewhere, but I

136453.en:
Huh-uh. Hey, hey, what is it? What did you just say about touching people's bodies! You want to unite the hearts of three mushrooms?
Hey, hey, stop joking around! We, the three fighting mushroom brothers, have been at loggerheads for a long time because of a
certain incident. But I'm an evil Kunai, and I don't want to make up with the other two now! I'm sorry, but you'll have to leave. Or what?
You want me to obey you by any means necessary?

136456.en:
Ugh... I'm so tired of it. I'm tired of it! I know you're serious. But I'm really Evil Kunai. I'm just a good giant who wanted to be friends
with Puku Lipo-chan who lives here. It's the brothers' fault that I ended up like this! Yes, that day I was making it rain to build a
giant swimming pool for Puk Lipo-chan to play in. But all of a sudden it got cold and all the rain froze. Only green brothers would do
such a thing. So, because I couldn't stand it, I yelled at Green Giant Greemor just when the three of us were meeting. Then for some
reason, Red Giant Rednov got angry at me. Why did you make it rain? I was like, ''Why did you make it rain? I had a good reason to be angry
at Green Giant Greemor. But Red Giant Rednov's argument is a mess! If you really want me to be sorry, you'll have to make Red Giant Rednov
sorry!

evil Kunai, and I don't want to make up with the other two now! I'm sorry, but you'll have to leave. Or what? You want me to obey you by
any means necessary?

136465.en:
Ummm? Mmmmmm... I'm Red Giant Rednov, but who are you? Do you want something from me? What? Blue Giant Blumel told you about our fight?
And you want me to make up with him? Ha-ha-ha. If that's the case, I have no intention of making up. I'm an evil Kunai to begin with. If
you understand, just leave me alone. Or what? Are you going to force me to obey you?

136466.en:
<pipipi_low>Hmmm. If that's the case, then I have no more
use for them, right?

136467.en:
<pipipi_low>Well, that's interesting. If you can do it,
try it!

136468.en:
I'm so excited. I'm so excited! I understand that you are serious. But I'm really an evil Kunai. I'm just a good giant who wanted to be
friends with Puku Lipo-chan, who lives here. It's the brothers' fault that I ended up like this! Yes, that day I was lighting a fire to
barbecue with Puku Lipo-chan. But while I was lighting the fire, all of a sudden it started raining heavily and everything went out. Only
the blue brothers could do that. So, I couldn't hold back and got angry at Blue Giant Blumel just as the three of us were about to
face each other. Then, for some reason, Green Giant Greemor took his anger out on me. Why did you want to put out a flame? I said.
There's a good reason why I got mad at Blue Giant Blumel. But what Green Giant Greemor is saying is a mess! If you really want me to be
sorry, make Green Giant Greemor sorry!

Supi Supi. Fuggah. What is it? I'm the Grimoire. You want something from me? Heh. You heard about the fight between the blue and red
brothers, didn't you? So you want to make things right. But as both of them would have said, I don't want to make up with them. I am

136478.en:
Oh, man, I'm so tired! I understand now that you are serious. But I'm really an evil kunai. I'm just a good giant who wanted to be friends
with Puk Lipo-chan who lives here. It was the brothers' fault that I ended up like this, wasn't it? That day, I was freezing rainwater
to make a skating rink for Puk Lipo-chan to play on. But as I was making the ice, it started to thaw more and more. This is because
the red brothers are making flames. So, I couldn't hold back and got mad at Red Giant Rednov just as the three of us were meeting.
Then, for some reason, Blue Giant Blumel got angry at me. Why did you freeze the rainwater? I was so angry with Red Giant Rednov. I had a
good reason to be angry at Red Giant Rednov. But what Blue Giant Blumel is saying is a mess! I don't understand it at all!If you want
to make things right with me, you'd better give me a convincing explanation!

Thanks to you. Thanks to you, I think I can forgive them now that we've been fighting for so long. We've been in this form for a long

243544.en:
It looks like the entrance to a cave, but it appears to be blocked by mushrooms and rocks. But if you look closely, you can see a crevice
where one person could manage to get through. Would you like to go through the crevice and enter the cave?

and rocks and entered the cave.
